requirements: You must be at least 16 years old
Application for Permits and Licenses (APL) Form
1 photocopy and an original LTO-accredited medical certificate
Original and 1 photocopy of the Theoretical Driving Course (TDC) certificate
Original and 1 photocopy of a valid government ID
For minors, a notarized parental or guardian’s consent with a valid government ID
If employed, a Taxpayer’s Identification Number (TIN)
You must be at least 17 years old
Duly accomplished APL Form
1 photocopy and original LTO-accredited medical certificate
Original and 1 photocopy of Practical Driving Course (PDC)
Original valid student permit
For minors, a notarized parental or guardian's consent with a valid government ID
If employed, a Taxpayer’s Identification Number (TIN)
You must be at least 18 years old
You must have no unsettled traffic violations
Duly accomplished Application for Permits and Licenses (APL) Form
1 photocopy and original LTO-accredited medical certificate
Original and 1 photocopy of Practical Driving Course (PDC)
Original valid student permit or non-professional driver's license
Original and photocopy of birth certificate
Valid NBI Clearance or Police Clearance
LTO Client ID
Taxpayer’s Identification Number (TIN)
